comments: Great teacher . very nice overall,understands his students gives you study guides before the test and is always interesting . Labs are always fun because you don\'t have to be prefect the first try , he helps you learn the labs which is great.
The best teacher I\'ve ever had. take him hes the best teacher. really easy and helpful. Hes really nice
